item.title: Comment on 5-in-5_Day2_Moving Eye by Laura

item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/01/23/5-in-5_day2_moving-eye/#comment-10">multi</a>.
Hi, I didn't use any plugin for the comment form. Maybe it's set in either Appearance/Tools/Settings sections?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to multi.

Hi, I didn’t use any plugin for the comment form. Maybe it’s set in either Appearance/Tools/Settings sections?

Thank you too for the feedback. I’m glad it’s helpful!

item.title: Comment on Triangulation! by Photophiliac
item.dc:creator: Photophiliac
item.description: Thank you so much for sharing your beautiful hard work with the world! It is very kind of you. These sketches were what inspired me to begin learning the processing language and I truly cannot thank you enough for showing me this facet of code generated art. It is a truly stunning media. Thanks again!
item.content:encoded: Thank you so much for sharing your beautiful hard work with the world! It is very kind of you. These sketches were what inspired me to begin learning the processing language and I truly cannot thank you enough for showing me this facet of code generated art. It is a truly stunning media. Thanks again!
